Sentencas: Monitoring and fault diagnosis can play a major role in improving the reliability of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) systems.
Titulo: Adaptive observer based approach for the fault diagnosis in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Due to complex interactions between the variables, quantitative model based methods are suitable for SOFC fault diagnosis.
Titulo: Adaptive observer based approach for the fault diagnosis in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this work, a fault diagnosis strategy based on a non-linear observer based approach is proposed for the SOFC.
Titulo: Adaptive observer based approach for the fault diagnosis in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Two nonlinear adaptive observers are designed based on the concepts of input-to-state stability of cascaded systems, each sensitive to different faults affecting the SOFC.
Titulo: Adaptive observer based approach for the fault diagnosis in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Simultaneous application of these two observers allows the unique identification and diagnosis of all the common faults in the SOFC.
Titulo: Adaptive observer based approach for the fault diagnosis in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This unique approach of multiple nonlinear adaptive observers for SOFC fault diagnosis can improve fault resolution and has applicability over wide operating ranges.
Titulo: Adaptive observer based approach for the fault diagnosis in solid oxide fuel cells
